register.title: Sign Up
register.subtitle: Come join us!
register.text: We are so excited to have you here.If you haven't already, create an account to get access to exclusive offers, rewards, and discounts.
register.loginLink: Already have an account? Sign In

login.title: Sign In
login.subtitle: Welcome back
login.text: Welcome back! We are so happy to have you here. It's great to see you again. We hope you  had a safe and enjoyable time away.
login.registerLink: Don't have an account? Sign Up
